name.ja: <ruby>空<rt>くう</rt></ruby><ruby>隙<rt>げき</rt></ruby>の<ruby>原<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>星<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>

text.en:
1 LIGHT or DARK Dragon monster + 1 Dragon monster
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can target cards your opponent controls up to the number of your LIGHT and DARK monsters used as its Fusion Material; destroy them. If this card is banished: You can target 1 Level 4 LIGHT or DARK Dragon monster you control; its Level becomes 8. You can only use each effect of "Protostar Dragon of the Void" once per turn.

materials: 1 LIGHT or DARK Dragon-Type monster + 1 Dragon-Type monster
